channel.title: git Install :: CIS 301 Textbook
channel.description: Verify a git install You will likely already have a command-line version of git installed on your machine. To check, open a folder in VS Code, display the integrated terminal, and type: git --version You should see a version number printing out. If you see that, git is already installed. If you see an error that git is unrecognized, then you will need to install it. Go here to download and install the latest version.
